animeID:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

animeID:MomoPower.NAME: Momo
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn Draw #b

animeID:TsuyuPower.NAME: Tsuyu
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn if you have 3 or more Cards in hand gain #b

animeID:ChisakiPower.NAME: Chisaki
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn Overhaul.

animeID:HawksPower.NAME: Hawks
DESCRIPTIONS: Take 50% reduced damage and generate a Shiv at the start of your turn.

animeID:EriPower.NAME: Eri
DESCRIPTIONS: Retrieve a Card from the Exhaust pile at the start of your turn. If pile is empty take 5 damage.

animeID:DabiPower.NAME: Dabi
DESCRIPTIONS: When you Exhaust Channel a Fire Orb.

animeID:BurnPower.NAME: Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: Take damage each turn for each stack.

animeID:PresentMicPower.NAME: PresentMicPower
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next Card is played twice.
